attributes.action: Legislate that Local Goverment, Councils, Housing Assoociations and Private Landlord Provide Home Services for disabled/elderly living in the Community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many elderly and disabled people live in the community in mixed housing and the authorities/landlords expect them to provide services such as gardening and adaptions, many don't have support of family living nearby and are reliant on the Landlord.
Sheltered housing is not madatory, nor could the authorities provide enough sheltered housing and many are happy and would not want to move but need support and adaptions quickly, a two years wait is to long.
